mods.abstract: Satirical, double, bust-length portrait of two typical male professors of 1975 dressed in academic gowns and mortarboards. Both professors have narrow elongated faces with a great deal of facial hair.
mods.note: the print is the companion to the one entitled "1955".

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
